1.content: Which Paw Patrol pup will you choose from or you can pick Sweetie and or Arrby.
1.title: The Paw Patrol's on a roll.

choices: Chase the big fat or giant fat superhero.
11.content:
Here's a special story starring Chase that you can choose to add to or you the reader can come up with your own interactive story.

Chase the big fat or giant fat superhero: In this special story Chase always fantasized about himself as that of a big fat or giant fat crime fighting superhero, now that fantasy of his is about to happen as Chase not only gains weight but also grows in size and channels his inner superhero.
11.title: Chase.

112.content: How about if Skye makes him fatter and or bigger as well?
112.title: Free Choice Chapter.

1121.content:
It all began one beautiful bright sunny day in Adventure Bay as Chase was done with his weight training for the day, as the scent of utterly delicious food filled the air itself as Chase smelled the scent itself.

"I wonder where that scent is coming from? I better go check things out and make sure nothing suspicious is happening." Chase said as he followed the scent that lead him right towards Skye's doghouse.

As soon as Chase arrived at Skye's doghouse Chase asked Skye about a scent that filled the air itself.

"About that scent that filled the air do you know what kind of scent it was that filled the air Skye?" Chase asked Skye.

"You see I made some really delicious yet fattening food for you as I'm going to try to make you not only fatter but also bigger as well." Skye explained to Chase.

"You're going to try to make me not only fatter but also bigger as well? What's this all about Skye?" Chase asked Skye.

"You see I've always not only thought of you as my soon to be big fat handsome hunk but also my soon to be giant fat handsome hunk as well." Skye explained to Chase.

"I see well since you not only thought of me as your soon to be big fat handsome hunk but also your soon to be giant fat handsome hunk I may as well go through with this." Chase said.

Now what will happen to Chase?
1121.title: Yes.

12.title: Marshall.

154.content: How should it happen? Well, Sweetie somehow succeeds in her ultimate goal of becoming the Queen, crown and all. And once she has all that power, it pretty quickly starts to go to her head- and her waistline.
154.title: Sweetie Swells up

choices: Later that night, Sweetie FINALLY- but begrudgingly- concludes her meal (WG)
Sweetie begins to grow UP as well as out (macro)
Something very bizarre happens as she's eating (???)
1541.content:
(Author's note courtesy of Writing.com's own Potato King here's a visual of what Sweetie looks like.)
https://i.imgur.com/Jc1HKz2.jpg

"Haahahahaha-snort!!!!" A high pitched wicked laugh rung out through the grand hall of Barkingburg Castle. The laughter came from the golden, shining royal throne, upon which was perched a triumphant Sweetie, who wore the coveted and elaborately decorated Barkingburg Royal Crown!

"HAhahahaha-snort!!!" She laughed once again, elated in her victory. "I've done it, I've finally done it for real, Busby!" She declared to her robotic squeaky frog toy, who had been her most faithful underling...mostly due to him being programmed that way. "I'm finally the Queen, just like I've always deserved to be!" She went on, "And the best part of all is now NO ONE can stop me! Now that the old Princess and Duke and everyone else who used to hold me back are banished! Not to mention that annoying Paw Patrol," she said, sneering at just the thought of them, but grinning yet again when she remembered "They can't take anything back from me either, Now that they're forbidden by my law to even enter the country!!!"

Sweetie jumped up and down in glee, laughing loudly, before settling back down with a smug smile. "Now, for the first order of royal business..." She said, biting Busby's head. Immediately, the frog toy's eyes lit up, and it sent out a signal like a remote control. Several large, more metallic, definitely more evil looking versions of Busby came out into the grand hall, along with a few nervous members of the castle's staff who Sweetie had decided weren't enough of a threat to get rid of. They all looked up to their new tyrannical dog-Queen, awaiting her command.

"Alright you lot! Robo-servants, real-servants, each of you!" Sweetie shouted, "From now on, no more dog food- not ever! No kibble, no canned, no rawhide, no nothing! Do you get it?" All the humans nodded, mumbling in agreement, while the robots stood still- they didn't have to agree out loud, she already knew they'd obey her. Sweetie's eyes lit up, a grin spread across her face as she declared triumphantly, "Good! Now, I want hamburgers!!! Loads of 'em! And keep them coming, even after lunchtime is over!"

Sweetie didn't have to wait long, as all the servants ran off to fulfill her request. Soon, they would return, carrying plates and platters and dishes of all sorts laden with her favorite food. One servant held a silver platter piled high with hamburgers. She licked her lips, eyes wide, drooling at the smell of the greasy meat patties for a moment, before opening wide and digging in. Sweetie buried her face in the pile of burgers, scarfing them down with big greedy bites, being as messy as she wanted. By the time she was hungrily lapping off all the sauce and grease left on the platter, her muzzle had ketchup, melted cheese, crumbs, and grease splattered across it. She smugly looked up, letting loose a loud, rude burp right in the servant's face, causing them to cover their nose and run away. Sweetie's stomach had gotten filled up a lot by those burgers. As she sat on her haunches with her forelegs down on the throne, it bulged out, touching the seat of the throne as well as the backs of her forelegs. Next, a robo-servant came up, offering her two platters with neat piles of Hamburgers. She devoured them just as furiously and greedily as the first, using her paws to sweep in armfuls of burgers at a time to her greedy maw, if something didn't fit into her mouth she'd just keep pushing it in, not caring if it got squished or crushed, just continuing to chew and swallow whatever was currently in there until she made enough room to cram the next one in, Though she was gorging so fast she barely chewed at all before gulping it down. Halfway through her binge, there was a tearing sound. Shhhrrrrip- as her burgeoning stomach tore through the front of her black suit with glowing pink lines. She didn't care, though, just eating and eating until both huge platters were empty. Her belly was so big, white fur spilling out from the tear in her suit like a little avalanche, that she couldn't put her front paws on the ground when she sat, as it pushed out past her forelegs enough to lift them a little bit, forcing her to rest her paws on its surface, as she had to spread her hind legs further apart to make room for it. Her butt had gotten bigger too, humble haunches blowing up into twin bulbous, fatty globes, her rotund rear straining against her tight suit, which conformed to and highlighted its new shapely and sizable nature. Sweetie's face was somehow even messier than before, covered in scraps and stains of leftover hamburger, some of which had actually gotten on her chest, arms, and especially her paws because of the way she ate them by simply shoving her front into a big pile. Sweetie threw back her head, unleashing a loud, rude, triumphant burp which made a few droplets of spittle and grease fly up like a sprinkler.

"More! More! More!!!" Sweetie yelled, maniacally, as five whole platters of hamburgers were held up to her by a robo-servant and three trembling humans. She grinned, laughing yet again before digging in. "HAHAHAHAHA-snort!!!!"

(Here's another link to what Sweetie looks like)
https://i.imgur.com/r1uPopb.jpg
1541.title: Greedy Sweetie

choices: They make it to the royal bedroom without incident- Dropping Sweetie off in bed
15411.content:
As the day went by, Sweetie absolutely refused to stop gorging her brains out for even a minute. Servants lined up, presenting her with platter after platter of decadent high calorie unhealthy hamburgers, which she greedily mowed through in minutes, never asking for any other kind of food, not even stopping to drink- barely stopping to take breaths- as her body expanded at a downright alarming rate, from her surging sloshy overstuffed belly to her increasingly voluminous bulbous and bouncy butt. From the chubby chipmunk cheeks on her increasingly round, greedy, messy face to her over sized bubbly and soft toes, being squished up against by her own paw fat. And yet, as she grew and grew, more and more, bigger and bigger and bigger, Sweetie didn't stop eating for more than a few seconds to rudely burp, take a quick breath, or demand more.

And so it was quite a shock when a servant who currently had Sweetie's fattened, pinched up, greedy little face buried in her platter of hamburgers, heard the furious and intense chomping, slurping, gulping, and glutting sounds of her ravenous feeding slow, picking up a bit again- before lulling to a steady stop, as the pile of burgers was only about three quarters eaten. He blinked, as did the few other exhausted human servants, who each had their own platter of hamburgers for the monstrously fat villainess who was their queen, now fallen mysteriously silent.

"Er...Queen Sweetie?" The servant said. After a moment of no response, he nervously repeated again, "Sweetie, your majesty? Are you alright?" He asked. Again, no response. He took a careful step back, afraid Sweetie might yell at him for taking away her precious favorite food, to get a better look at his ruler in all her greedy glory.

The thing on the throne was barely recognizable as a dog. Sweetie had become fully immersed in her own white furred flab, and she appeared similar to a big beanbag chair sized sack of dough. Her body overflowed the seat of the throne, pouring off of it on all sides, squished up against the backrest as she bubbled through and around the armrests, engulfing them in herself. She could be described as a pile of several bulbous rolls with pudgy paws sunken into them at points, dangling uselessly, along with a messy, sunken face.

Sweetie's belly had grown out so far it sagged past the cushion on the throne, and was wide enough to obscure both corners from the front. It had been bisected into two large plush fat rolls, the fold along her naval carrying up and melding into her love handles. Sweetie's legs were all fully spread out, resting on their own sacks of doughy flab like big luxurious pillows. She bulged out over the top of the armrests on both sides of the chair, fat also oozing out from the spaces under the armrests. That combined with the way her utterly gigantic beautifully round and bouncy but still soft and tender juicy plush massive rump was crammed up against the backboard of the chair, easily wider than it and spilling out the back, fat wrapping around and engulfing it as the top of her big fat butt crested almost as high as her crown, visible rising up like twin hills above her submerged head and rolls of back fat. Her face was hard to make out at first, as it was squished between cheeks so big and squishy and overstuffed that they rested on her arm fat and crested high enough above her head to pinch her crown into place, as her back fat being pushed upwards by the unholy size of her butt was smothering the crown like oozing lava. Her face also bulges out into a big hefty triple chin, the first two squished between her cheeks and the third resting on her fatty voluptuous overgrown soft and doughy chest fat. Sweetie's stomach, chest, and chins were so fat they forced her to look upwards a bit. She'd almost completely torn apart her black suit, outgrowing it to such a degree that only a few stray scraps around her arms, chest, and back desperately clung together as white furry flab poured out from between them. Also, because of her furious and ravenous method of devouring the burgers, her entire face was covered in messy stains. Ketchup, crumbs, meat juice, melted cheese, and lots of grease caked her snout and splattered out, covering most of her first two chins as well as her inner cheeks- which were so big and chubby that they wrapped up around about the same length forwards as her muzzle, but probably a bit more. The stains also went up to her forehead, simply because of how deep she would bury her face into the food piles as she ate, the mosaic of messy red, brown, and orange splotches caking her face like a mud mask. As the servant took a look at Sweetie's colossal form, he noticed that her little eyes, smothered by her cheeks- a stark contrast to how huge the rest of her had become, were closed, stains all over her eyelids. To his shock, Sweetie's mouth- which had been clutching a half eaten hamburger, fell open- the bun and patty tumbling down the slope of her fatty belly and splatting on the floor, as the chewed up part she hadn't swallowed yet joined the menagerie of stains on her chin.

"Oh no- oh no! It happened!" He cried in a panic. Another servant stepped forwards, holding a full platter she was going to give Sweetie after the first. "What? What happened?" She asked, worriedly. "I've killed her! All this unhealthy junk food- she ate herself to death but I'm the one who fed her the killing burger! Oh no- I'll be thrown in prison!" He cried. Astonished and horrified, the servants all crowded around to get a look at the messy doughy blob, to see if it was true.

"She's not dead you idiot- look!" Another man said, pointing to the behemoth pup. Sure enough, the overstuffed mound of bulging saggy rolls and folds was gurgling lightly, heaving with slow, drawn out, labored- but relaxed sounding- gutteral huffs, wheezes, and snorts. "She's breathing- see?" The servant who had been feeding her sighed in relief, "Oh thank goodness- I was so worried I'd really messed up."

"But- what are we going to do now?" A servant asked, looking to her companions. One man with a big mustache rubbed his chin in thought, looking around. "Well, let's see- who do we have here?" He asked, looking at the other servants. "Hmm...we have five of us human workers, and it looks like...Eleven of her robo-servants" He said, looking up at one of the ominous frog robots, which were taller and stronger than all the humans there. "Well...if She's fallen asleep, I guess we have to bring Queen Sweetie to bed." The other servants all groaned, dreading the thought of trying to lug that insanely overweight soft and squishy fat sack anywhere. "Why don't we make the robots do it? They're stronger than us anyway." A man recommended. "Not possible- Only Sweetie can control them. And since she's asleep, they haven't got any orders to follow. Look at them, just standing there." A man shuddered at the gleaming, silver titan with glowing pink eyes. "Ugh. It gives me the creeps."

"Well at any rate, it looks like we are going to have to carry her to the royal bedroom ourselves." A man pointed out. "Now let's stop whining about it- there are five of us after all. Everyone grab as much of her as you can, and try to get her unstuck from that throne. I'll bet since she passed out from all those burgers, she'll be in a pretty heavy sleep for a while, so we don't have to worry too much about being gentle. As long as we don't drop her!"

(Here's yet another picture of what Sweetie looks like.)
https://i.imgur.com/kdQvwO9.jpg
15411.title: Sweetie Pile

choices: Queen Kong begins her invasion of Adventure Bay.
The Paw Patrol springs into action.
15412.content:
As Sweetie was eating her hamburgers, she started growing larger and fatter as she outgrew the very castle she was in as her servants themselves ran for their lives.

At that moment Sweetie noticed everything was smaller than her as she was now giant sized and looming over all of Barkingburg itself.

"I'm impressed with my new giant size as I'll wreak havoc upon not only Barkingburg but also Adventure Bay as well along with any other cities that dare stand in the path of Queen Kong." Sweetie roared as she now renamed herself Queen Kong as she started stomping towards the city itself as she started causing a panic in Barkingburg as she smashed every building that stood in her path including the city's clock tower as well.

Soon nothing was left standing as Queen Kong's next target was Adventure Bay itself as she started stomping towards Adventure Bay.

Meanwhile in Adventure Bay early the next day at dawn our heroes the Paw Patrol's pups had gotten up as they all gathered at the breakfast table with their beloved leader Ryder.

"Everyone before you eat your breakfast, I've got some bad news to share with all of you." Ryder said as he addressed the Paw Patrol's pups.

"What's the bad news Ryder?" Chase asked.

"I spoke to the Earl of Barkingburg and the princess of Barkingburg last night after you all went to bed as they informed me that Sweetie banished them and everyone else from Barkingburg and to make matters worse Sweetie declared a law that forbid you Paw Patrol pups from entering the country of Barkingburg." Ryder explained to the pups as they were shocked by what they just heard.

"We're forbidden from entering the country? Sweetie's gone too far this time." Chase said.

"I don't understand it we've stopped Sweetie in the past, now what are we gonna do?" Marshall asked.

"I can't believe Sweetie banished the princess and Earl of Barkingburg, we gotta stop her!" Skye said.

"This is not good, after all we're the only ones who can save the day." Rocky said.

"Oh man I can't believe what I'm hearing dude." Zuma said.

"We can't let Sweetie get away with this y'all, after all we just gotta do something if y'all know what I mean." Rubble said.

"Sweetie's gotta be stopped at all costs!" Everest said.

"Si for after all we as a team must stop Sweetie!" Tracker said.

At that very moment....
15412.title: Sweetie begins to grow UP as well as out (macro)

155.content: Now then you can either choose Arrby or another path as the Paw Patrol's characters themselves won't be feral giants and giantesses but in reality giant anthropomorphic versions of themselves.
155.title: Arrby/Other.

choices: Arrby the big fat and or giant fat entertainer.
1551.content:
Here's a special story starring Arrby.

Arrby the big fat and or giant fat entertainer: In this special story starring Arrby he decides to give up his pirating ways and leave Sid the pirate as well, as he decides to be good for once as he tries his paw at being an entertainer as he too gains weight and height as well.
1551.title: Arrby.

choices: Rubble the big fat and or giant fat pro wrestler.
1553.content:
Here's a special story starring Rubble.

Rubble the big fat and or giant fat pro wrestler: In this special story starring Rubble, he tries his paw at professional wrestling as he becomes a face aligned wrestler known as the big dog of the south as he himself gains weight and or height as well.
1553.title: Free Choice Chapter.

15532.content: Not sure if this would count, but was wondering maybe it would be fun if human characters could grow into obese giants for sure? For this one, you can either choose Ryder, the team leader, or Alex Porter, the grandson of the restaurant owner?
15532.title: What about human characters?

155321.content:
You chose Ryder to grow into a obese giant boy. The question is what scenario does the team leader of Paw Patrol are you gonna choose to start this off.

Fat Giant Superhero: Ryder always wanted to become a superhero! So much so that when he first put on a costume to look like a hero, he’ll have the ability to grow taller and fatter to help save the day.

Giant Sumo Wrestler: Ryder wondered what it’s like to be a sumo wrestler, but they’re about to start a mega sumo wrestling tournament, which meant anyone who wanted to compete, gets to grow into a obese giant for a chance to win the grand prize. Ryder is very much curious and wanted to give this opportunity a go.

Fatzilla Ryder: Ryder had recently watched Godzilla, which he loved it so much. It was later that night when he had a dream of himself being a obese giant boy, terrorising Adventure Bay for fun.
155321.title: Ryder

155322.content:
You chose Alex Porter to grow into a obese giant boy! What scenario would you like to choose to start the scene?

Pups and the Beanstalk: Named from an actual episode itself, this version would be a dream when Alex climbs down the beanstalk as an obese giant, exploring Adventure Bay for fun.

Too Tall Alex: This would be a version where Alex gets effected by a strange smoke, which caused him to grow taller and fatter. The bigger he gets, the hungry he’ll get to find and fill up his appetite.

One Big Wish: Alex is fed up of being so small, so on that night, he decides to make a wish, wanted to be bigger than anyone else. This may be a good thing or a bad thing, when the next day, he would find himself big, if not way bigger than he had expected. Be careful what you wish for, Alex!
155322.title: Alex Porter

155324.content: Here's a special story starring Mr. Nibbles A.K.A The Copycat.
155324.title: More Choice Chapters.

info.brief_description: The Paw Patrol's characters grow and gain weight.
info.description:
The Paw Patrol's Characters become fat giants and giantesses.

I'll allow anything for this interactive story except cussing of course. Feel free to make whatever you the reader want it to be.
